mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT count(0) FROM media_device_channel t2 WHERE t2.deleted = 0 AND t2.data_type = 1 AND t2.parent_id= t1.id) as channel_count FROM media_device t1 WHERE t1.deleted = 0 AND t1.gb_id = #{gbId}
SELECT t1.* FROM media_device t1 JOIN media_device_channel t2 ON t2.parent_id = t1.id WHERE t1.deleted = 0 AND t2.deleted = 0 AND t2.gb_id = #{channelGbId}
